Michael, what build was it? What OS? I've launched the tests on both Windows and Linux, but I couldn't track the failure. I know it's an intermittent thing but I any tips would be helpful.

The failure was on the Mac I believe. I will look at the test in M3 to see if I can find where the timing problem is occurring (i.e. these failures often happen because the test case gets ahead of the workspace state so an assert is invoked too soon).
